name: Rare Xyster
description: Lacking the elongate antlers of the Common Xyster, this Rare Magical nevertheless has adapted itself to collect the thoughts of nearby beings. That said, it sets its sights on a much bigger target than mere Monsters - it can listen in on the ruminations of the Enchantler itself! The Rare Xyster is able to accomplish this via various villi covering its body that maximize surface contact as it tunnels through the pores of the Titan.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 1 day 2 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 19 hr 52 min 30 sec
